Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Fax resource to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the Account that created the resource
**api_version**: The API version used to transmit the fax
**date_created**: The ISO 8601 formatted date and time in GMT when the resource was created
**date_updated**: The ISO 8601 formatted date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated
**duration**: The time it took to transmit the fax
**from**: The number the fax was sent from
**links**: The URLs of the fax's related resources
**media_sid**: The SID of the FaxMedia resource that is associated with the Fax
**media_url**: The Twilio-hosted URL that can be used to download fax media
**num_pages**: The number of pages contained in the fax document
**price_unit**: The ISO 4217 currency used for billing
**sid**: The unique string that identifies the resource
**to**: The phone number that received the fax
**url**: The absolute URL of the fax resource
